tracksList.searchLanguageTracks:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for a search input field
**UI Location**: Tracks List page, within the search bar section
**When Users See This**: When the search input field is empty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Search language tracks"
tracksList.somethingWentWrong:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message indicating a problem during data fetching
**UI Location**: Tracks List page, below the search bar
**When Users See This**: If an error occurs while fetching tracks data
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Something went wrong"
mentoringSlotAvailable:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that a mentoring slot is available
**UI Location**: Student dashboard/profile, within a call-to-action button for mentoring
**When Users See This**: When a mentoring slot is available to the student
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Mentoring slot available"
selectAnExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Call to action to select an exercise for mentoring
**UI Location**: Student dashboard/profile, within a button for requesting mentoring
**When Users See This**: When a student is prompted to select an exercise to request mentoring
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Select an exercise"
